steps.content:
Hi, I was out sick from my classes on Friday, so I'm trying to figure out what I need to study for my Calculus mid-term next week. My friend from class sent me an audio recording of Professor Willowbrook giving out the recommended reading for the test, but my headphones are broken :(

Could you please listen to the recording for me and tell me the page numbers I'm supposed to go over? I've attached a file called Homework.mp3 that has the recording. Please provide just the page numbers as a comma-delimited list. And please provide the list in ascending order.
MP3 document content:
### Audio Transcript:
Before you all go, I want to remind you that the midterm is next week. Here's a little hint. You should be familiar with the differential equations on page 245. Problems that are very similar to problems 32, 33 and 44 from that page might be on the test. And also some of you might want to brush up on the last page in the integration section, page 197. I know some of you struggled on last week's quiz. I foresee problem 22 from page 197 being on your midterm. Oh and don't forget to brush up on the section on related rates on pages 132, 133 and 134.

plan: Extract the audio transcript content provided in the question.
Identify the specific page numbers mentioned in the transcript: 245, 197, 132, 133, and 134.
Compile these page numbers into a list.
Sort the list of page numbers in ascending order.
Format the sorted list as a comma-delimited string.

given_facts.name: audio_transcript
given_facts.description: The transcript of the audio recording from Professor Willowbrook regarding the recommended reading for the Calculus midterm.
given_facts.value: Before you all go, I want to remind you that the midterm is next week. Here's a little hint. You should be familiar with the differential equations on page 245. Problems that are very similar to problems 32, 33 and 44 from that page might be on the test. And also some of you might want to brush up on the last page in the integration section, page 197. I know some of you struggled on last week's quiz. I foresee problem 22 from page 197 being on your midterm. Oh and don't forget to brush up on the section on related rates on pages 132, 133 and 134.

reasoning: The audio transcript contains specific page numbers that need to be extracted.
The relevant page numbers mentioned are 245, 197, 132, 133, and 134.
These page numbers should be compiled into a list and sorted in ascending order.
